embeds.title: Verifying Users :white_check_mark:
embeds.description:
We use [Double Counter](https://doublecounter.gg/) to help keep the server safe and detect users attempting to join with alt accounts. All successful verifications and attempted alt account intrusions are logged in <#1243689429441445888>.
- When a user joins the server, they are automatically given the <@&1393718800062353408> role: 
  - Limited access to server channels 
  - Unable to connect to voice channels (VCs) 
- After completing the [verification process](https://ptb.discord.com/channels/1204097271768023090/1393747831583408168), they are granted the <@&1204119127401173012> role, which unlocks full access to the server. 
- Some users may join with alt accounts for non-malicious reasons. In such cases, it is acceptable for staff members to manually verify the account.

fields.name: Commands:
fields.value:
- `/force [user/ID]` - Forces a user to verify
- `/manverify [user/ID]` - Manually verifies a user
